info.title: Project Experience
info.description: This API enables you to manage the project experience information of your workforce in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management. You can read, create, update, and delete the external work experience or a qualification of a workforce. For reasons of data protection and privacy, only batch requests are available.

x-sap-shortText: Manage the project experience information of your workforce.

host.description: Your host where SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management is deployed

environment.description: Your defined environment for SAP S/4HANA Cloud for projects, resource management account

post.description: Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Indicates the media type of the resource.

ProjectExperienceService.ExternalWorkExp.title: The assignments that the worker completed in their previous companies.

ID.description: The identifier of the external work experience entry.​

role.description: The role of the worker in the project.

startDate.description: The start date of the assignment or project.

endDate.description: The end date of the assignment or project.

comments.description: Additional information about the assignment or project.

_skillAssignments.description: The assignments of skills to the external work experience entry.

changedBy.description: The user by whom the external work experience was last updated.

changedAt.description: The date and time when the external work experience was last updated.

ProjectExperienceService.ExternalWorkExp.title: The assignments of skills to the external work experience entry.​

ID.description: The identifier of the external work experience skill assignment.

externalWorkExperienceID.description: The identifier of the external work experience entry.

proficiencyLevelID.description: The identifier of the proficiency level that the worker has in the skill.

proficiencyLevelName.description: The name of the proficiency level that the worker has in the skill.

skillUsage.description: The usage status of the skill. The usage of the skill can be restricted or unrestricted.

changedBy.description: The user by whom the skill assignment for an external work experience was last updated.

changedAt.description: The date and time when the skill assignment for an external work experience was last updated.

ProjectExperienceService.PrimaryWorkAssi.title: The current primary work assignment of the worker

jobTitle.description: The job title of the worker within the company.

managerWorkAssignmentExternalID.description: The identifier of the work assignment of the worker's manager.

officeLocation.description: The physical location of the worker's office.

costCenterID.description: The identifier of the cost center that the worker belongs to.

costCenterDisplayName.description: The display name of the cost center that the worker belongs to.

workAssignmentID.description: The identifier of the work assignment.

ProjectExperienceService.PrimaryWorkAssi.description: The current primary work assignment of the worker

ProjectExperienceService.Profiles.title: Read the project experience information of your workforce.

workforcePersonExternalID.description: The identifier of the worker from the source system, for example, from SAP SuccessFactors.

firstName.description: The first name of the worker.

lastName.description: The last name of the worker.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the worker.

mobileNumber.description: The cell phone number of the worker.

changedAt.description: The date and time when the profile was lasted updated.

_primaryWorkAssignment.description: The current primary work assignment of the worker.

_skillAssignments.description: The assignments of skills to the profile.

_externalWorkExperience.description: The assignments that the worker completed in their previous companies.

error_400.description: Bad Request - You have provided an invalid request parameter or the payload does not match the expected format. See error message for details.

error_401.description: Unauthorized - No valid access token (JWT) has been provided or it has expired.

error_403.description: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary authorization to perform this action or to access the requested resource.

error_404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist.

error_409.description: Conflict - Could not create the resource, due to a conflict with an existing one (e.g. a unique value was provided that is already used). See error message for details.

success_201.description: Created - The request has been fulfilled, resulting in the creation of a new resource.

success_204.description: No Content - The server successfully processed the request, and is not returning any content.

OAuth2.description: OAuth client credentials (client ID and secret) are required.
